post.text: Share this if you're voting today for National Early Vote Day! hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Courtney
comment.text: Hillary should have a ad of all the business that were hurt by Trump and all that loss money at Trump university.and all women that were grabbed..makes a loud statement of this worthless man

replies.author: Courtney
replies.text: Excuses me... this is a page for Hillary..does this make you feel special

replies.author: Shaun
replies.text: Your words are not facts, but "right out of HC's mouth!" And we know what those are...... fabricated lies!
